item.description:
Join fellow Naturalists at Worcester Ecotarium for a celebration of science! Saturday March 23rd
The Worcester Ecotarium is a science museum and planetarium.
http://www.ecotarium.....

222 Harrington Way
Worcester, Massachusetts 01604
Directions: http://www.ecotarium.....

Wear something yellow to show of solidarity with fellow freethinkers!

We will be meeting in the cafeteria at 12:00 for lunch.
Bring your own lunch or...
Vending machines inside the museum's Food for Thought Cafe are stocked with a selection of drinks, snacks and light lunches or breakfast items, including yogurt, muffins, fruit and sandwiches. The Cafe offers an indoor lunchroom year-round.
At 1:00 we will tour the many exhibits.
There is a show in the planetarium at 2:00
The museum closes at 5:00pm

Admission:
Adults $10.00
Children/Youths ages 3-18* $8.00 (Under 16 must be accompanied by an adult.)
Senior citizens (ages 65 and older) $8.00
College students (valid I.D. required) $8.00
Children under 3 Free

Planetarium $3.50
item.name: Worcester Ecotarium!
